divs: Sighting Detailswas driving south south on crane, when i saw what looked like a man riding on a bike without tires. it was flying toward me [north] up crane. then turned right going [east]. the just floated away
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were no other sightings in Casa Grande on or around July 30th 2012
Summary: this may sound strange but the object looked to be a man sitting on a bike without wheels
